verses.text: \w The|strong="H1732"\w* king rejoices, \nd Lord\nd*, \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* might, how \w he|strong="H1732"\w* exults because \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* help!

\w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* granted \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H8055"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* heart’s desire, \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* not withheld \w his|strong="H3068"\w* lips’ request. \qs Selah\qs*

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* came \w to|strong="H5414"\w* meet \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* rich blessings, \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* head \w a|strong="H3068"\w* golden crown.
\w He|strong="H3588"\w* asked \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* life, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* gave \w it|strong="H3588"\w* – many long days, forever \w and|strong="H7218"\w* ever.

Great \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* glory \w because|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w help|strong="H4480"\w*, honor \w and|strong="H3117"\w* majesty \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H7737"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* most blessed forever, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H7737"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* glad \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w* puts always \w his|strong="H6440"\w* trust \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd Lord\nd*; \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Most|strong="H1293"\w* High, \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* love, \w will|strong="H1293"\w* preserve \w him|strong="H6440"\w* unshaken.

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w will|strong="H3068"\w* reach \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* foes, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* hand, \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* hate \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w like|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* furnace \w of|strong="H3027"\w* fire, \w when|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* appear, 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3225"\+w*
d*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3225"\+w*
d* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* swallow \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wrath. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* fire \w will|strong="H3027"\w* devour \w them|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sweep \w their|strong="H3068"\w* offspring \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth, \w their|strong="H3068"\w* children \w from|strong="H6440"\w* humanity.
\w When|strong="H1121"\w* they scheme against \w you|strong="H2233"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* hatch evil plots – they \w will|strong="H1121"\w* fail.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* aim \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w bow|strong="H5186"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w faces|strong="H5921"\w*, \w make|strong="H2803"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w turn|strong="H5186"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* flight.

\w Be|strong="H6440"\w* exalted, \nd Lord\nd*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* strength, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* might \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* sing \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w make|strong="H7896"\w* music.
